and is that country's only harbour.  The harbour was used to transport the large amounts of steel that Luxembourg used to produce, though the production of steel is now much lower so this harbour is used less frequently.
The official Circular Walk of Mertert
, 10.3 km, passes by the Moselle River, through vineyards, and atop a nearby hill for a good view of the valley.
Continue up or down the Route du Vin -- by car, by bike or on foot -- on the Luxembourgish side of the Moselle River.
is on the Moselle River, about 25 km south.
